thread.title: Volkswagen on right path for new CEO despite profit hit

title: Volkswagen on right path for new CEO despite profit hit
text:
Volkswagen on right path for new CEO despite profit hit Thursday, April 26, 2018 - 01:31
Volkswagen's first-quarter operating profit has fallen but optimism over its new chief executive and lower diesel emissions scandal provisions lifted its shares. As Sonia Legg reports, two weeks after elevating brand chief Herbert Diess to group CEO the German carmaker is shifting the focus to making its operating business more efficient. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Volkswagen's first-quarter operating profit has fallen but optimism over its new chief executive and lower diesel emissions scandal provisions lifted its shares.
